general_info.summary: This document provides a listing of various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives offered or associated with Sharda University. It includes details on academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and School of Nursing Science & Research, administrative reports such as the Examination Annual Report and University Brochure, student development programs focusing on skills and entrepreneurship, and other university-related information including leadership, history, and media like FM Radio Suno Sharda-90.8FM. The content appears to be a navigational or informational index for the university's website.

career_info.summary: This text outlines how to apply for a course and details the career paths available upon completion, specifically mentioning roles like Research & Development Software Engineer and Electronics and Communications Consultant. It also lists potential employers such as Tata Consultancy, Nokia, LG Electronics, and Samsung India, encouraging individuals to pursue engineering careers.
career_info.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Research & Development Software Engineer
• Electronics and Communications Consultant
• Tata Consultancy Pvt Ltd
• Nokia India Pvt Ltd
• LG Electronics India Pvt Ltd
• Samsung India Electronics Pvt Ltd
Take the next step towards a career in engineering.
